flashcards.english: 3rd Singular (He/She): Nĩ aracaria (is searching) → 1st Singular (I): Nĩ ndiracaria (I am searching). 3rd Plural (They): Nĩ maroka (are coming) → 1st Plural (We): Nĩ tũrĩoka (We are coming)
flashcards.notes: Complete pattern showing transformation from 3rd to 1st person. Pattern: Nĩ a-/ma- → Nĩ ndi-/tũrĩa-. Examples: aracooka→ndiracooka (coming back), areka→ndireka (doing), araikara→ndiraikara (staying), marathĩĩ→tũrĩathĩĩ (going), marathooma→tũrĩathooma (reading)

examples.english: He/She is bathing → I am bathing
They are laughing → We are laughing
They are writing → We are writing
